relations.Subject: reform
relations.Description:
The reform should strengthen Georgia economy and embark in an energy
transition in full compliance with the Paris Agreement.

relations.Subject: program
relations.Description:
The program pays a 
particular attention to the promotion of energy efficiency both on the supply and 
demand side.

relations.Subject: program
authorities
relations.Description:
In the coming months, Georgian authorities should adopt the National Energy 
 Efficiency Action Plan (NEEAP) as well as several secondary acts to 
operationalize the reforms.
